professionalExperience.name: Front-End and Back-End Student
professionalExperience.description: I started my studies in Front-end at the end of 2022, starting to learn with HTML, CSS3, SASS, BOOTSTRAP, DOM Manipulation with JavaScript, I carried out several projects using the knowledge acquired such as Pokedex, My first website, to-do list. During this journey, I moved from the country where I currently live to Portugal, so I ended up taking a break from my studies in August 2023 and ended up being unable to study for a while, I resumed my studies in July 2024, carried out content reviews, and soon after I took a Programming Logic course certified by the Dio platform. I further studied JavaScript from basic to advanced, taking courses through the Udemy and Dio platforms, where several projects were completed, Pokedex with API consumption, My Portfolio, Code challenges to materialize the learning. I took a TypeScript course through the Udemy platform, where I focused on using the Angular framework. I took several courses and projects, such as TypeScript, Task List, Routes, Reactive Forms, Dark Theme, My Portfolio with Angular V17+, Typescript Angular V17+, Angular Universal SSR-SSG. I continue to study every day to become a Full-Stack developer, as everything starts with the first step, I am looking for my first opportunity in the job market.
